items.sentence: That's the craziest fucking thing I've ever heard!
You aren't really going to join the army, are you?
Please let me know the next time you're in Boston.
If it rains tomorrow, the game will be called off.
The dress that Mary was wearing yesterday was red.
Tom suggested to Mary that they move to Australia.
You'd never try to do that by yourself, would you?
I grew up in a small town not too far from Boston.
It took Tom a long time to break out of his shell.
What's happened to the book I left here yesterday?
Do you usually eat pancakes with butter and syrup?
Chimpanzees can grow to be up to 180 cm in height.
I won't let you go there unless Tom goes with you.
The blue whale is the largest animal in the world.
Your French has improved a lot since we first met.
You won't be able to convince Tom that he's wrong.
Are you really going to press charges against Tom?
Tom won't likely be able to resist the temptation.
I think Tom will be awake by the time I get there.
Tom was the only one who Mary felt understood her.
My father took his place at the head of the table.
Here's a list of things Tom told us we should buy.
I avoid discussing personal subjects with my boss.
I have a question regarding your earlier comments.
I don't believe you, and neither will anyone else.
I must finish this work by the day after tomorrow.
I can't remember who I'm supposed to give this to.
I can't remember whether or not I locked the door.
People are waiting longer to get married nowadays.
You're the tallest girl in your class, aren't you?
I still have some things to do before I can leave.
If people want to do it on their own, that's fine.
Tom put his head down on the desk and fell asleep.
Tom opened his backpack and took out his computer.
When I walked into the room, they stopped talking.
Tom will very likely be the last student to leave.
This part of the river is too shallow for a canoe.
I'm afraid that we're going to be late for school.
I'm sorry I couldn't live up to your expectations.
I don't think that any more students want to come.
He told us such a funny story that we all laughed.
I don't hate you anymore. Now you just disgust me.
What Tom said to me felt like a shot to the heart.
I need to take another package to the post office.
Tom isn't the kind of guy you'd want to mess with.
I promised your parents that I'd take care of you.
The weather has been nice for the past three days.
That's how it works, and the only way it can work.
Tom doesn't want to have anything to do with that.
We had to postpone the picnic because of the rain.
